abstract: Markets decline, but earlier rally is still sufficient to give stocks their best week in nearly two months following encouraging news from Federal Reserve.
lead_paragraph: Investors were keeping an eye on events overseas, as talks between Greece and its creditors remain unresolved with a big debt repayment looming.

headline.main: After Three Days of Gains, the Market Slides Back
headline.print_headline: Market Rally Wanes Despite Boost From Fed

snippet: Investors were keeping an eye on events overseas, as talks between Greece and its creditors remain unresolved with a big debt repayment looming.
